entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 March 2023
